help.introduction: This is a search engine using advanced Information Retrieval techniques in order to search through biblical verses.
help.how_to_use_content:
First select a Bible version, then create your search query using at least three terms i.e:
"God created heaven earth". When you get results also you will be able to click/tap on any specific verse and the new search query will be created using the selected verse keywords.
help.bible_miner_website: More advanced version it's available at Bible Miner website. There you can find Biblical Dictionaries search, automated summaries and context reading.
